verses.roman:
trimalla bhaṭṭera ghare kaila prabhu vāsa
tāhāñi rahilā prabhu varṣā cāri māsa

synonyms: trimalla bhaṭṭera—of Trimalla Bhaṭṭa; ghare—at the house; kaila—did; prabhu—the Lord; vāsa—residence; tāhāñi—there; rahilā—lived; prabhu—the Lord; varṣā—the rainy season; cāri—four; māsa—months.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu lived at the house of Trimalla Bhaṭṭa for the four months of the rainy season.
